programme.desc: Emma (Uma Thurman), a radio host, is about to be married to Richard (Colin Firth), her perfect match. But right before her wedding, she learns she's already married to Patrick (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a charming but irresponsible fireman. Furthermore, Patrick has a secret: he has arranged this little trick because Emma advised Patrick's ex-fiancee to end their relationship. However, Patrick may find that the trick is on him, for he soon begins to fall in love with his uptight adversary.

programme.title: Point Break

But this is no ordinary group of robbers. They're surfers -- led by the charismatic Bodhi (Patrick Swayze) -- who are addicted to the rush of thievery. But when Utah falls in love with a female surfer, Tyler (Lori Petty), who is close to the gang, it complicates his sense of duty.

programme.title: I Feel Pretty
programme.desc: An ordinary woman who struggles with feelings of insecurity and inadequacy on a daily basis wakes from a fall believing she is suddenly the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. programme.title: Push

Aided by his trusted sidekick, Microchip (Wayne Knight), he almost kills Billy Russoti (Dominic West) and leaves him horribly disfigured. Billy renames himself Jigsaw and with the help of his crazed brother Loony Bin Jim, recruits criminals from every corner of the city to do battle with Frank.

programme.desc: Jeff Bauman loses both of his legs when two bombs explode during the Boston Marathon on April 15, 2013. After regaining consciousness in the hospital, Jeff is able to help law enforcement identify one of the suspects, but his own battle is just beginning. With unwavering support from his family and girlfriend, Bauman embarks on a long and heroic journey to physical and emotional rehabilitation.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin

programme.title: Stargate

programme.title: Ne Zha

programme.title: Snake Eyes

Kevin Dunne (Gary Sinise), as well as Defense Secretary Kirkland (Joel Fabiani), he witnesses a terrorist assassinate Kirkland. Despite a lockdown on the arena, key witness Julia Costello (Carla Gugino) escapes -- and Santoro begins to suspect Kirkland's death is part of a much larger conspiracy that involves boxing rivals and a beautiful stranger.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: After building an empire with bootleg alcohol, legendary crime boss Al Capone (Robert De Niro) rules Chicago with an iron fist. Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness (Kevin Costner) attempts to take Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy City's police force. Recruiting an elite group of lawmen who won't be swayed by bribes or fear, including Irish-American cop Jimmy Malone (Sean Connery), Ness renews his determination to bring Capone to justice.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction

In this ultra-hip, multi-strand crime movie, their storyline is interwoven with those of their boss, gangster Marsellus Wallace (Ving Rhames) his actress wife, Mia (Uma Thurman) struggling boxer Butch Coolidge (Bruce Willis) master fixer Winston Wolfe (Harvey Keitel) and a nervous pair of armed robbers, "Pumpkin" (Tim Roth) and "Honey Bunny" (Amanda Plummer).

programme.title: Mortal Thoughts
programme.desc: Two New Jersey hairdressers try to cover up a murder without destroying their friendship.

programme.title: Running With Scissors

programme.title: Fresh Horses
programme.desc: A safely conservative college senior meets a country girl who changes the course of his life.

programme.title: I'll Do Anything
programme.desc: She's the most maddening female he's ever met, and she's only six years old.

Following the accidental death of a tightrope walker, Rivers is pleased to see her profits increase and callously unconcerned with the demise of her employee -- in fact, she soon hires handsome Frank Hawkins (Ty Hardin) to replace him. But when several more performers meet gruesome deaths, it becomes apparent they are no accidents, and there's a killer on the loose.

programme.title: The Game That Kills
programme.desc: A man infiltrates a hockey team to investigate the death of his brother, the team's star left wing.

The scheme backfires, however, when Laura falls in love with the company's gruff CEO (Paul Douglas) and makes herself the leader of an all-out shareholders' revolt.

programme.title: Jason and the Argonauts
programme.desc: After saving the life of his royal father's usurper, Pelias (Douglas Wilmer), whom he fails to recognize, Jason (Todd Armstrong) is encouraged by the conniving murderer to begin a quest in search of the Golden Fleece. In doing so, Pelias hopes for Jason's death to thwart the prophecy that he will reclaim the throne. Along the journey, Jason is protected by the goddess Hera (Honor Blackman), and his crew includes Hercules (Nigel Green) and Acastus (Gary Raymond), a saboteur planted by Pelias.

programme.desc: The Texas State Armadillos are fourth down and nowhere-to-go after a corruption scandal nearly ends the football program. Now upstanding coach Ed Gennero (Hector Elizondo) must put together a brand-new team.

programme.desc: The Texas State Armadillos are fourth down and nowhere-to-go after a corruption scandal nearly ends the football program. Now upstanding coach Ed Gennero (Hector Elizondo) must put together a brand-new team.

Frightening events turn annoyance into terror, as they begin to realize that one of their number is Lucifer himself.

Bug (Max Thieriot), plagued by nightmares all his life, is one of the so-called Riverton Seven, and it's up to him to save his friends from an evil that will not rest.

With his beloved wife, Mirena (Sarah Gadon), Vlad has brokered a prolonged period of peace and ensured that his people are protected, especially from the Ottoman Empire. However, when Sultan Mehmed II (Dominic Cooper) demands 1,000 of the country's boys, including Vlad's son, for his army, Vlad makes a deal with a monster that will enable him to defeat the Turks -- but cost him his humanity.

programme.title: Mary Proud
programme.desc: Mary Proud is a single mother who finds stardom as a rhythm and blues singer at a high personal price. Living in Ohio, Mary and her little sister are separated by social services after they are abandoned by their disturbed and drug-addicted mother. Years later, strong-willed Mary finds herself in a nasty divorce with Gary, an unfaithful husband and church deacon. Her determination to provide a better life for her two children and to make a career in the music industry pays off when she meets AC Wells, a successful music producer from Atlanta. After relocating to Atlanta, Mary's career takes off, but she encounters a fresh set of problems after starting a volatile relationship with a rapper on AC's label, and a new drug habit. Mary is admitted to a rehabilitation program, and later is diagnosed as bipolar. After completing rehab, Mary is determined to recover her damaged career and her life. Finally, Mary realizes a new personal success, achieved by working to change her life toward a healthy and positive direction.

programme.desc: In the 1990s, Lorenzo DuFau (Ossie Davis) tells the story of the USS Mason, the historic World War II battleship with an entirely segregated black crew. Aware of their deadly mission, the sailors aboard the USS Mason engage in fierce combat and fight to defend their country, despite the overwhelming racism back home in America. But even without the support of their nation, the crew members dedicate themselves to completing their mission and returning home alive.

programme.title: 18 Holes
programme.desc: In this episode of 18 Holes, hosts Jimmy Hanlin and Natalie Gulbis visit Pickens Golf Club just outside Greenville, South Carolina. They explore a unique nine-hole golf course that doubles as a full 18-hole experience thanks to varied tee boxes and alternating pars. Alongside the course, the duo showcases Carolina Camp Cedaran RV and cabin resort featuring future amenities like a lit par-3 course, restaurant, pool, beach area, and golf simulators. The episode highlights the evolving nature of golf, the benefits of nine-hole layouts, and the joy of combining golf with the laid-back culture of RV camping.

programme.title: MeatEater

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Boone and Bugles: Kentucky Bull Elk
programme.desc: Steven Rinella is invited by the Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation for a special opportunity to hunt elk during the rut in the mountainous coal country of southeastern Kentucky, a place where his hero Daniel Boone once roamed. This is Steve's first eastern elk hunt, and he quickly realizes that the rules of the game here are different. If he manages to track one down, he'll prepare what was supposedly Boone's favorite meal: elk liver.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Cold Water: Alaskan Seafood Cooking Special
programme.desc: Join Steve on this Cooking Special as he dives into the best of Alaskan seafood, featuring shrimp, crab, fish, and clams. Learn how to make easy, delicious seafood recipes that showcase the fresh flavors of the sea. Whether you're a seasoned cook or a beginner, Steve's simple steps will help you prepare mouthwatering dishes that capture the essence of Alaskan waters.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Big Buck Dreams: Colorado Mule Deer
programme.desc: Steve's annual quest for a giant mule deer buck continues this year in southwest Colorado. Here, Steve fills us in on his favorite critter, the mule deer. As he hunts will share his vast knowledge about these special western game animals including how to hunt, butcher, and most importantly how cook them-if he can put his tag on one.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Surf N Turk: Wisconsin Turkey and Carp
programme.desc: Steven Rinella scratches his spring turkey itch this year as he visits Southeast Wisconsin to call in some big eastern Toms with his buddy Jerod Fink. The guys also plan to do some bow fishing after dark so they can enjoy a real Midwest turkey and fish fry.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: The Best Start - Wild Game Breakfast Cooking Special
programme.desc: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, but is often overlooked by wild game cooks at home. Following a series of successful hunts across North America this past fall, Steve demonstrates how to cook a variety of breakfast classics using wild game ingredientsincluding black bear bacon, which Steve has never tried before.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Gila Monster: New Mexico Bull Elk
programme.desc: After four years of waiting, Steven Rinella draws a coveted, limited-entry public land bull elk tag for New Mexico's Gila National Forest. Steve heads into the backcountry on a solo backpack hunt where his biggest challenge is the vast expanse of hills covered in thick timber. This demanding hunt requires lots of glassing and even more hiking. Here, even just one missed opportunity could result in an empty freezer.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Hearts of Darkness: Ticker Cooking Special
programme.desc: While its considered a long-standing hunting tradition to eat the heart of your first kill, the heart.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Bear With Seal: Alaska Bear Hunt Part 1
programme.desc: Steven Rinella will take Navy SEAL Rorke Denver on his first hunt deep into the Alaskan backcountry to search for black bears in the mighty Alaska Range. In the remote wilderness, two friends will look into the differences and similarities between the hunter and the warrior. The bears are out but Rorke and Steve will have to work hard to put a tag on one.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.sub-title: Hunting Land Man - "Summer Farm Work, Deer Season is Coming!!
programme.desc: On this episode of Hunting Land Man Season 3, Slade puts in some early summer farm work to Ensure his target bucks are well fed! Slade also Talks about his Target buck for the year, "Pope"! Slade is laying the trap early in hopes "Pope" makes a mistake early!

programme.title: Hunting Land Man

programme.title: Hunting Land Man

programme.title: Hunting Land Man

programme.title: AFTCO Original Film
programme.sub-title: AFTCO Original Film - "The Muskellunge - Spencer Berman
programme.desc: Few freshwater species are more steeped in lore than North America's native muskellunge. Sporting the nickname "The fish of ten thousand casts," musky remains unchecked on the bucket list of many casual and committed anglers. Spencer Berman caught and landed his first "by accident," a fortuitous but ultimately fateful encounter. "I got bit by the musky bug at a young age," he says, and it appears the bug is alive and well. It drives me to be better, do better, fish longer, work harder, put more into it, do more prep work, to check each and every component. I'm forever and always willing to make one more cast.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.sub-title: Fly Shop Tour - "Our 2500 Mile ROAD TRIP Begins
programme.desc: Welcome to The Fly Shop Tour! In September of 2022, we set across the Rocky Mountains on a 2500 Mile Road Trip visiting & fishing with local Fly Shops. Our Mission? To highlight small businesses that drive the sport we love: Fly Fishing! Along the way, we got a chance to host meetups in every state - all with the goal to raise money for local conservation organizations & meet some of our fans. Follow us as we tell the story of 12 unique fly shops, fish the waters surrounding their area, and make our way throughout the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: Aging pals Billy (Michael Douglas), Paddy (Robert De Niro), Archie (Morgan Freeman) and Sam (Kevin Kline) have been best friends since childhood. When Billy finally proposes to his much-younger girlfriend, all four friends go to Las Vegas to celebrate the end of Billy's longtime bachelorhood and relive their glory days. However, the four quickly realize that the intervening decades have changed Sin City and tested their friendship in ways they had not imagined.

programme.title: Eurotrip
programme.desc: After a brutal breakup at a high-school graduation party, lovelorn Ohio teen Scott Thomas (Scott Mechlowicz) goes on a quest across Europe to find his sexy German pen pal, Mieke (Jessica Boehrs). Joining him are his brainless buddy (Jacob Pitts) and a pair of twins (Travis Wester, Michelle Trachtenberg) they meet up with in Paris. Scott's quest does not turn out to be easy, however, and the backpackers become embroiled in many farcical situations as they hop from country to country.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Josh (Breckin Meyer) videotapes his affair with another girl and accidentally mails it to his girlfriend. Discovering the mistake, he tows two of his college buddies -- and one not-so-eager kid who happens to own the car -- on a raucous 1,800-mile road trip from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin, Texas, to save his lifelong romance.

programme.title: The Guilt Trip
programme.desc: Before embarking on a once-in-a-lifetime road trip, Andy Brewster pays a visit to his overbearing mother, Joyce. That proves to be a big mistake Andy caves in under pressure to take his mom along for the ride. Early on -- as the miles roll by -- Andy feels nothing but aggravation at her antics. Eventually however, he comes to realize that they have more in common than he first thought and that Joyce's wisdom might be just what he needs.

programme.title: Kabir Singh
programme.desc: Energetic and in-your-face comedian Kabir Singh jokes about why serial killers are white, Indian stereotypes, and why Siri's racist.

programme.title: Jordan Makin
programme.desc: Born and raised in the heart of Utah County, Jordan Makin had to compensate for his red hair and uneventful childhood by learning to be funny. His unique observations will make you laugh and his stories about feeling awkward will help you appreciate your life more. He has worked with many comedy greats, such as Marc Maron, Ryan Hamilton, and Drew Lynch. His comedy has been featured at the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival and the Idaho Laugh Fest. Jordan is the co-creator and co-host of The Happy Valley Podcast.

programme.title: Kendra Cunningham
programme.desc: Boston bred and Brooklyn based, Kendra Cunningham has been named as a comic to watch by Time Out New York and has been compared to Groucho Marx and Mae West by the UK's Chortle.

programme.title: Drew Barth
programme.desc: Drew Barth is one of the fastest rising comedy stars in the Northwest. Born just outside the city of Seattle, what started as a dare in high school has become a full-time career. Drew Barth has risen through the ranks of local open mics to become a regular performer at comedy clubs, colleges, casinos and private events up and down the West Coast. After making the finals of the Seattle International Comedy Competition, Drew Barth spent a great deal of time in Los Angeles performing at clubs such as The Comedy Store, Laugh Factory, and The Improv, honing his craft.

programme.title: Chad Thornsberry
programme.desc: Chad Thornsberry was born in St. Louis, MO. From an early age he learned his family was blessed, and blessed him with humor, quick wit, and a love of storytelling. Chad's unique comedic perspective awards audience the opportunity to laugh at the common occurrences in everyday life. Often referred to as a great writer, his straightforward style allows audiences to laugh with him and at him as they find the humor in themselves. With reflections on growing up in a trailer park and observations as an English teacher, Chad's satiric insights look at the pitfalls that make us human. With smart humor and a conversational style, Chad has delighted audiences from the trailer park, throughout the Midwest, and from coast to coast.

programme.title: Jeff Shaw
programme.desc: Jeff Shaw's writing is marked both by idealism and humanity. His stimulating satire is often infused with poetic beauty. More importantly, he looks like Rod Stewart.

programme.title: Max Dolcelli
programme.desc: New York comedian Max Dolcelli uses his cynacism and enigmatic stage presence to riff on Waze, Dollar Store pregnancy tests, and how horrible toys were when he was a kid.

programme.title: Marc Yaffee
programme.desc: Adopted at birth and confused ever since, Marc takes his audiences on a comedy joyride as he explores his multi-ethnic roots and the culture clashes that fill his world. Marc's smart but relatable comedy demonstrates a universal appeal that has landed him appearances on PBS, Comics Unleashed, The Latino Laugh Festival and the Showtime special, Goin' Native. Funny not filthy, Marc serves audiences his original comedy recipe, specially prepared for non- stop laughs. Tasty topics, spicy premises and savory punchlines, are all dished out with a dash of sarcasm and a grain of salt. A regular in Las Vegas, Marc has performed six times overseas for Armed Forces Entertainment and he's a past winner of Ventura Comedy Festival's Funniest Person Contest.

programme.title: Match Game Hollywood Squares Hour
programme.desc: Contestants compete to win cash prizes in a mash-up of two game show formats, first by trying to match celebrities' answers to fill-in-the-blank questions and then by choosing to either agree or disagree with celebrities' answers to trivia questions.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: In this original version of iconic game show "Family Feud," actor Richard Dawson plays host to two teams, each comprised of five family members, who try to match the answers given to survey questions asked to groups of people (typically 100 people in the group). The family that wins the game by being the first to reach a certain point total, either 200 or 300 depending on the rules at the time, advances to the bonus round, called Fast Money, for a chance to win thousands of dollars by answering more survey questions.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: In this original version of iconic game show "Family Feud," actor Richard Dawson plays host to two teams, each comprised of five family members, who try to match the answers given to survey questions asked to groups of people (typically 100 people in the group). The family that wins the game by being the first to reach a certain point total, either 200 or 300 depending on the rules at the time, advances to the bonus round, called Fast Money, for a chance to win thousands of dollars by answering more survey questions.

programme.title: Password
programme.desc: Two contestants, each teamed with a celebrity partner, compete in a word-association game. One player tries to guess a word based on clues offered by his or her partner. The game is timed, and if the clue-giver inadvertently says part of the word, a buzzer sounds and that round is lost. When the time is up, the team with the most points wins, and the non-celebrity contestants wins cash.

programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: Gene Rayburn hosts this comedy-game show hybrid in which contestants try to match answers given by celebrities to humorous, and often risque, fill-in-the-blank questions. The contestant with the most points at the end of the game advances to play the bonus round, in which the contestant has a chance to win thousands of dollars, with the actual amount dependent on the rules in place at the time of the episode.

programme.title: Card Sharks
programme.desc: This show from legendary Mark Goodson-Bill Todman Productions features two contestants trying to predict answers to survey questions for the opportunity to play a game with oversized playing cards for a chance to win cash. One contestant guesses how many people (out of 100) gave a certain answer to a question and the other contestant then guesses if the number is higher or lower than the opponent's guess. The winning contestant then faces a row of cards and must determine if each succeeding card is higher or lower than the one that precedes it. The contestant who wins two out of three games wins the match and plays the bonus round, called Money Cards. The Money Cards round is similar to the card game in the main game but with three levels of cards instead of one row. The contestant is given $200 at the beginning of Money Cards and wagers any or all of that money when guessing if the cards will be higher or lower than the previous one. A perfect round could earn the contestant $28,800.

programme.title: Steve
programme.desc: For five seasons, Steve Harvey hosted a daytime talk show that was based in Chicago. In 2017, looking to focus more on celebrity guests, the show got a face-lift -- including shortening the title to simply "Steve" -- along with a move to Los Angeles, where there is no shortage of famous people for Harvey to welcome to his stage as guests. In addition to conducting interviews, Harvey brings his fresh -- and often funny -- perspective to the day's hot topics and Hollywood happenings. The show also features games and comedy and lifestyle segments. Whether he's chatting with a star or sharing his opinions on the news, Harvey does it as only he can.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Josuke and Jotaro learn that a man with a bow and arrow was responsible for awakening Angelo's Stand ability. Realizing the town is still in danger, they decide to find the bow and arrow before it can create any more victims.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Josuke enters the Nijimura Brothers' house to rescue Koichi, who is in critical condition after getting shot by Keicho Nijimura's bow and arrow. But when Josuke steps into the house, he is attacked by Keicho's Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: After defeating Keicho, Koichi insists they find the bow and arrow and destroy it. Josuke agrees, but when the two enter the attic where the bow and arrow are being kept, they hear an inhuman noise inside.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: On his way to school, Koichi finds himself blackmailed by a man named Tamami Kobayashi, who frames him for running over a cat. A panicked Koichi starts to feel guilt for his actions, when suddenly a giant lock appears on his chest!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Josuke and Koichi get info that a student at their school, Toshikazu Hazamada may be a Stand user and decide to look into the case. Their suspicions are quickly confirmed after Hazamada's wooden doll morphs into an exact copy of Josuke, and attacks them.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: We're getting up close and personal with some of the world's largest land animals! Animal Care specialists use a revolutionary approach to care for a herd of Asian elephants. Dr. Mike performs a cold laser treatment on one of the elephants while the other four elephants enjoy a fantastic day including an elephant version of a pedicure. And then, running from the law, an emu accidentally cuts his neck, and it's up to The Wildlife Docs to save him.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: The Wildlife Docs introduce the newest additions at the park. First, it's a big day in the lion's den as three lion cubs enjoy a special treat in honor of World Lion Day. Then it's off to the Serengeti Plain to meet Jisiri, the baby rhino and Kishana the baby zebra, plus not one but two giraffe calfs are introduced to the herd.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: Witness the Animal Care Specialists teach the hippos behaviors to help The Wildlife Docs give check ups, examine teeth and even take X-rays, all in the name of hippo health! And why do flamingos stand on one leg? Why are they pink? Do they really fall in love? You'll get the answers to those and many more questions when the flamingos come marching in on The Wildlife Docs.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: We'll try and catch up with the world's fastest land animal, the cheetah! More than a dozen cheetahs have moved into their new home, and an unlikely pair becomes fast friends. Then, Antlers, the muntjac, is not eating so he's brought into the ACC where The Wildlife Docs diagnose his condition. Plus, Philip the hedgehog is an Animal Ambassador at the park, helping to educate the public about wildlife conservation. Lately, Philip hasn't been feeling well, so the Animal Care Specialists call on The Wildlife Docs to find out why.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: The park is home to two of the most unusual mammals in the world! The team offers insight on the echidna and shares the unique traits that really set this creature apart. Then Bengal tiger Jafari is known as the leading lady at the Busch Garden's tiger habitat. But life for her didn't start out this way. At only seven weeks of age, she and her brother Jamoki were being sold out of the back of a car. Busch Gardens Tampa stepped in and rescued the cubs. See how the two adjusted to their new home and witness Jafari as she goes in for her medical and dental checkup.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: Dr. Pete is called to Kangaloom because Baby the wallaby is not acting normalsuddenly another wallaby is also showing the same symptoms. Now it's up to The Wildlife Docs to solve the mystery of the sick animals before it affects the entire mob. Then, rattlesnakes and eyelash vipers are among the most venomous snakes in the world. We'll see how the Animal Care Specialists and veterinarians take great care in handling these deadly snakes when it's time for their medical checkups. We'll also find out if one of the eyelash vipers is pregnant and the very unique and unusual way these snakes give birth.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.desc: The Wildlife Docs team up with The National Audubon Society to save hundreds of wild birds a year. We'll introduce you to a barred owl recovering from a ruptured air sack. Thanks to the help of The Wildlife Docs and the rehabilitators, the owl is healed and ready to be released back into the wild. Witness the successful return home for this lucky bird. Plus hundreds of animals roam the 65-Acre Serengeti Plain at the park. From rhinos and giraffes to antelope and impala, the Animal Care Specialists train these hoof stock to voluntarily come in at night to participate in their own health care. Before the care team rings the bell to say goodnight, an addax on the veldt has a broken horn and needs to visit The Wildlife Docs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan
programme.desc: Professional Realtor Ernesto Robles presents Cesar with a new breed of problem: his four children are hounding him to buy a puppy, but Ernesto is terrified of dogs and has been his entire life!

programme.title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan
programme.desc: Sabrina Peukert fell in love with her Welsh Sealyham Terrier Maxwell's cocky attitude. But Sabrina's constant catering to Maxwell has gotten her nothing but two and a half years of pompous dominance. Giving affection to Maxwell is always on his terms.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan
programme.desc: Dog groomer Lauren asks Cesar for assistance with her three worst cases - hyperactive Great Dane Buster hair dryer devouring Jack, a boxer mix and fearful Aussie mix, Marley.

programme.title: Lucky Dog Reunions

programme.title: Top 13 Most Painful Insect Stings Coyote Peterson Has Ever Taken!
programme.desc: Coyote ranks the top 13 most painful insect stings he's ever taken. From bullet ants to wasps, it's a countdown filled with pain and science. From sand to sea, Coyote builds a mini mudflat aquarium packed with bizarre marine creatures. It's a deep dive into ocean ecology.

programme.title: Exploring Most Haunted House in America!
programme.desc: Spooky vibes abound as Coyote explores one of America's most haunted houses. What's real? What's legend? Only one way to find out. Pain is part of the job, but this one really hurts. Coyote's wild encounter leads to a cringeworthy injury and a valuable field lesson.

programme.title: Mini Bulls Don't Have Mini Horns!
programme.desc: They're tiny, they're horned, and they're tougher than they look. Coyote introduces us to mini bullssmall cattle with big personalities. Mark gets another joltthis time on purposefrom an electric eel. He demonstrates how the animal uses electricity to navigate and defend.

programme.title: Electric Eel Shocks Me Again... and Again!
programme.desc: Mark returns to the electric eeland gets shocked again and again. This episode highlights electricity in nature and its incredible uses.500 fire ants. One arm. Coyote takes a sting challenge that pushes the limits of pain while explaining how fire ants swarm and attack.

programme.title: $100 Coffee vs. 1 Coffee Which Actually Tastes Better?
programme.desc: Is a $100 coffee really better than a $0.01 cup? Coyote hosts a wild taste test to find out if price truly equals flavor. BOOM! Coyote gets hit by a surprise blast during filming. He's okaybut the slow-motion replay says otherwise.

programme.title: I've Taught You Everything. It's Time.
programme.desc: The swamp is calling and this time it's war! Coyote faces off against fellow wildlife expert and YouTuber Ray Tiller for a wild snapping turtle showdown you won't want to miss.

programme.title: Stung by Meanest Scorpion in Thailand!
programme.desc: Watch as Mark takes on the first recorded sting from the dangerous Thai Bark Scorpion! Where will it land on the Brave Wilderness Bite-Sting Index? How will the sting compare to the likes of the Bullet Ant, Fire Worm, and the deadly Arizona Bark Scorpion? We're about to find out!

programme.title: Coyote, Lexie, & Skye Compete for Prehistoric Gold!

programme.title: Human Blood vs. Snake Venom!

programme.title: HUNGRY LIKE A WOLF

It's a barren land, sometimes like from another planet but still familiar. A land of contrasts and colours with wide landscapes and fascinating deserts. Influenced by various cultures during colonization and now reborn from the shadows of Apartheid in 1990, Namibia gives a beautiful collage of culture, language, art, music, and food.

programme.title: Nature's Survivors
programme.desc: Every year, the Earth is hit by cyclones, earthquakes, volcanoes and floods. These events make the headlines, with alarming human death toll numbers. But what about animals? This one-hour special explores how animals cope with natural disasters before, during and after the events themselves. Animals have gone to great lengths to make the most out of some very perilous predicaments, and future climate change could force them to make even more changes in order to survive.

programme.title: Laugh & Learn
programme.desc: Laugh & Learn is a charming educational show designed for preschoolers, where entertainment meets learning. Featuring adorable characters, the show introduces children to fundamental concepts such as numbers, letters, shapes, and colors through interactive play, memorable songs, and engaging storylines. Each episode encourages curiosity and cognitive development while ensuring children have a joyful and laughter-filled experience. With its vibrant animation and child-friendly approach, Laugh & Learn by Mattel is a trusted companion for parents and a beloved favorite among young viewers

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: "Kipper" is an enchanting animated children's series that centers around the whimsical escapades of a lovable dog named Kipper. Alongside his friends, including Tiger the dog, Pig, and Arnold the piglet, Kipper embarks on a variety of adventures that emphasize friendship, curiosity, and the joy of discovery. The show is known for its gentle humor, engaging storytelling, and colorful animation that appeal to preschool-aged children. With each episode, young viewers are invited into Kipper's world where everyday experiences turn into magical explorations, fostering a love for learning and imagination.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby's Favorite Places: First Words Around Town
programme.desc: As babies turn one year old, they continue to develop their communication skills. Meanwhile, with you as their guide, they also begin to explore the world beyond their front door. Baby's Favorite Places presents them with a playful introduction to 20 words for the names of familiar locations from the market, to the library, to the local park.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Einstein: Let's Learn About Animals in the Water
programme.desc: Discover the wonderful world of water and deep dive into all the amazing creatures that call the ocean home. Learn simple words about the sea like water, coral reef, and ocean through narration and repetition. Engaging live-action footage of your favorite ocean friends and classical melodies will dazzle your little explorer as they experience the magical world under the sea.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Meet fascinating creatures from across the globe and learn to run, hop, and crawl like your favorite animal friends. Dance and sing along to discover animal names and the native habitats of the world's most unique creatures. See real-life images of lions and zebras on the African savannah, then learn animal names through repetition and narration, or simply watch your favorite animals play!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Hop aboard to see vehicles that travel by land, water and sky! See real-life images of cars, boats and planes in this on-the-go adventure that features cameos from some of your favorite Baby Einstein characters, all while listening to music from around the world.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As little ones grow, their innate sense of wonder grows too, creating an occasion for celebration with each new discovery. Baby Galileo Discovering the Sky introduces them to that remarkable canopy above us: the sun and moon, fluffy clouds, shimmering stars, colorful planets and whirling galaxies.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: With the Dolittle, and other Baby programs under their belts, the tots who follow Julie Aigner-Clark's Baby Einstein series will sidle up to Baby Newton expecting a similar exploration of building blocks to brilliance, but this time there's a wrinkle or two. Animation makes its first appearance, and parents steeped in keep-it-simple culture may object to the springy "I Know My Shapes" song, a departure from classical-only video predecessors.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Einstein: Let's Learn About Animals Around the World
programme.desc: Meet fascinating animals from across the globe! Dance and sing along with puppets and discover some of the world's most unique creatures. Join us to dance along to classical melodies as we learn animal names through narration and repetition or simply enjoy seeing live-action footage.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Wordsworth: First Words Around the House
programme.desc: As their communication skills continue to develop, little ones begin to recognize common words and may point to objects or pictures when these items are named. Baby Wordsworth playfully taps into your little one's natural curiosity and introduces 30 words from around the home -- both spoken and in sign language. This engaging program presents little ones with familiar objects in the kitchen, playroom, yard and more -- from the living room window to their favorite teddy bear.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Every stage is an exciting adventure with your newborn. As babies grow, they absorb a wide variety of sights and sounds. And with so much to see and hear, infants seem to enjoy, and be most soothed by, gentle sounds such as your voice or pleasant, restful music. Treat your child -- and yourself -- to the delights of Baby Bach Musical Adventure, an award-winning program that exposes babies to the joy and majesty of classical music while presenting them with stimulating, colorful images.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby MacDonald: A Day On the Farm
programme.desc: As little ones' curiosity about the world blossoms, you can help sow the seeds of discovery with Baby MacDonald: A Day on the Farm. Featuring live-action images, nursery rhymes and fun-filled puppet shows, this playful, interactive program introduces little ones to the exciting sights and sounds of a real working farm.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: The Berry Best You Can Bee
programme.desc: Strawberry is at Orange's store to mail a birthday card to a friend in Big Bitty City. Just after she drops the card into the mail slot, an ill postal carrier bee sneezes sending envelopes and post cards flying in all directions. The two girls help Jadeybug, a postal clerk, and Postmaster Bee gather up the strewn letters and the ill bee gets sent home from work.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: While rehearsing a song alone in her cafe, Strawberry is interrupted by the arrival of Jadeybug. The poor ladybug is stressed out because her twin cousins, Kadiebug and Sadiebug, left her a message that they are coming to visit for a whole week. Jadey is unable to host them because she's having her guest room repainted.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Plum decides to hold a dance recital at Strawberry's Caf Cabaret stage and sends out a stack of invitations. She forgets, however, to check the sign-up sheet at the Caf and schedules it for the same night as Blueberry is scheduled to read to the baby Berrykins. Strawberry tells Plum she cannot hold the recital in the Caf on her chosen day because the Caf is booked.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: All of Berry Bitty City is gathered around to watch the last snowberrykin melt. As the last bit of snow forms a puddle, a cheer goes up, spring is here! It's now time for the annual BerryFest. But with Princess Berrykin out of town on business, who will be the BerryFest Princess and preside over the festival?! Everyone is abuzz with how to go about choosing the Princess and what her duties will be. Postmaster Bee declares the only fair way to go about it is to hold an election. Everyone agrees.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry opens her front door to a throng of Berrykins all cheering for the new BerryFest Princess. She is appreciative of their admiration but unsure of exactly what her duties entail. In response the Berrykins bombard her with her duties - major to miniscule. One Berrykin sums it up by telling her she's responsible for presiding over all the activities of the BerryFest to make it the best.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: All of Berry Bitty City is excitedly making their way through the berry batch in search of the elusive Wanderberry. It is to be the dessert at the BerryFest Feast. Everyone is milling about searching for it on their own when Blueberry points out that the rules say the BerryFest Princess is in charge of the search. The girls turn to her for direction and she points them where she thinks the berry might be.

programme.desc: To convince the dance-averse Huckleberry to attend the big masquerade ball at the dog park, Blueberry promises she'll stay by his side the whole evening and make sure he doesn't have to dance. But as the day of the ball dawns, Blueberry awakens with a bad cold. She doesn't know how to tell Huck that she can't go to the ball. Lemon and Raspberry misinterpret her sniffles, thinking she's so heartbroken to be disappointing Huck that she's crying! Unaware that Strawberry has promised Blueberry she'll take care of Huck at the ball, and feeling sorry for their friend, Lemon and Raspberry independently decide to dress up like Blueberry and fill in for herneither knowing that the other is also doing so!

programme.title: The Berry Biggest, Berry Baddest Bakeoff
programme.desc: Berry Bitty City is abuzz as Berrykin Bloom introduces the biggest, juiciest, strangest fruit anyone has ever seen! It's the size of a house, shaped like a strawberry, colored like a watermelon and has a spiky pineapple top. I call it the sparklestrawwaterpineberry! says Berrykin Bloom. Princess Berrykin declares it the greatest achievement in Berryculture she's ever witnessed. To mark the occasion, and to honor all that Berrykin Bloom has done for Berry Bitty City, she decrees that they will have a Berrykin Bloom day, and there will be a ceremony in his honor. Berrykin Bloom is very humble about the whole thing, but the girls wish there was something special they could do to help honor him on his big day.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Stuckey the garbage truck dreams of entering the Auto Show, so Rev and the gang clean him up for his big debut. But after saving his friends from danger, Stuckey winds up covered in mud all over again...just in time for his moment in the spotlight! // When Lori only receives two tickets to a movie premiere, her friends compete to see which one of them is her "best friend." But watching her friends compete only makes Lori feel terrible-she'd rather not go to the movie at all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Gear Up Grand Prix // Chinese New Year
programme.desc: As the Gear Up Grand Prix begins, each of the friends runs into problems and must drop out of the race. Soon, slow and steady Lori is the only one left standing! Cheered on by her friends, can Lori and Tipper find the confidence to win? // When the gang puts on a Chinese New Year play, they cast Rumble as the monster. He's a natural! But in rehearsal Rumble begins to worry that he'll be too scary for the audience on opening night. Rumble will need his friends to help him find his roar!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: In Deep Doo-Doo // Rev's Tree Party
programme.desc: When Rev asks to help beautify the town, he insists there's no job too tough! That is...until he finds out he'll be hauling stinky manure. Rev tries to pawn the job off, until Avery tells him the best way to get it done is to just... "doo-doo" it! // When the gang organizes a birthday party for Rev, Avery insists they keep it secret. After hiding Rev's gifts in a tree, they realize the presents are stuck up there and will need to be retrieved-all before Rev figures out what's going on!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Driving Miss Dottie // Follow the Bouncing Wrecking Ball
programme.desc: When Miss Dottie goes missing, Rev and Avery offer to return her to the Rancher's Jamboree! Rumble is star-struck by the show-sheep, until the unlikely duo become friends. Back safe, Miss Dottie takes the stage, this time with her new pal Rumble! // Rev is determined to master Rumble's new wrecking-ball attachment, but things quickly get out of hand when the duo refuse to ask for help. Now they'll need all the help they can get to stop the wayward ball from wrecking all of Fender Bend!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and the gang are painting a mural for Four-Wheeled Friendship Day! But with Avery in charge, the friends start to lose confidence in their work. She may be a master when it comes to art, but Avery has a lot to learn about being project leader! // When the pals befriend a mouse in the barn, Rumble can't resist breaking the rules by bringing the little guy a snack. Before long there are mice everywhere! Rev and Rumble will need to shoo away their tiny guests, before Mom and Dad find them!

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: The courageous and swift police car POLI, the powerful fire engine ROY, the intelligent AMBER, and the flying HELLY are all here to save the day!

programme.title: Jenny's Magic Shop
programme.desc: Jenny and her best friend Blam the Teddy Bear run a magic shop in the town of Dreamville, where everybody can come for magical help. The residents of Dreamville always leave the shop thanking Jenny, but actually, they set the stage for their own miracles, leaving behind in the shop whatever is keeping them from living life and making decisions. After all, the ability to change yourself is the truest form of magic. Jenny and Blam never refuse to help anyone, but it often happens that they're the ones who need help, since Jenny's still a kid and Blam's an eccentric teddy bear.

programme.title: The Fixies
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them!

programme.title: Back to Back
programme.desc: Embark on an electrifying journey as they boldly leap from one heart-pounding expedition to the next, fueled by their unbreakable bond and insatiable thirst for excitement. Get ready to be swept away in a whirlwind of adrenaline-pumping quests, where danger and discovery await them at every turn.

programme.title: Helper Car
programme.desc: Cartoon for kids about helper cars: a fire truck, an ambulance, a police car and a tow truck. Why these cars and trucks are useful? Because they help people and other cars: fire truck can put out fire, ambulance helps people, when they are hurt or sick, it could drive them to the hospital. Police car patrols the city. Tow truck help other cars, when they are broken down. Watch new car cartoon and learn about helper cars!

programme.title: Everything's Rosie
programme.desc: Join Rosie and her friends as they go on fun adventures, play games and solve problems. Each episode contains an educational message so that kids are engaged while learning. With a focus on friendship the show also promotes positivity through teamwork.

programme.title: TurboZaurs
programme.desc: The adventures of dinosaur's squad transforming into big machines who are willing to solve any difficulties that kids may face in their everyday life.

programme.title: Pins and Nettie
programme.desc: Pins and Nettie are besties and there is nothing they like more than going on adventures together, most of time.

programme.title: Dibo The Gift Dragon
programme.desc: Let's Party in Cozy Island!

programme.title: Ebb and Flo
programme.desc: The world of Ebb and Flo is seen through Ebb's eyes and Ebb reveals all the emotions grown-ups try to hide. Flo doesn't think of Ebb as a dog, and Ebb doesn't think of Flo as a small human, they just are the best of friends. Until Bird arrives to lovingly disrupt Ebb's world. Ebb and Flo's home is an old boat moored by the beach. Things Couldn't Be Better!

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Rock your kids to sleep with our carefully curated lullabies featuring Hush Little Baby and more!

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: A serene world awaits, as you journey with Kent and Elly through a soothing collection of music.

programme.title: Soothing Melodies
programme.desc: Step into a world of Soothing Melodies like Hey Diddle Diddle, Hush Little Baby, and more!

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: This special collection includes Five Little Buses, Johny Johny Yes Papa and more fun melodies.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Here's a collection of gentle melodies featuring Little Boy Blue, Let's go to sleep, and many more.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Gentle songs to help kids sleep peacefully with calm tunes and soothing rhythms.

programme.title: Chiki Art Soothing Moments
programme.desc: Dive into Chiki Art Soothing's world filled with artworks like Glitter Fish, Shooting Star and more

programme.title: Rise and Shine
programme.desc: Kickstart your day with beautiful morning melodies like Bath Song, Exercise Song, and Vegetable Song

programme.title: Non Stop Hits
programme.desc: Here's a collection of animal songs for kids featuring Pet Song, Don Gato, Bingo Song and more!

programme.title: ducktv
programme.desc: The learn with ducktv section presents ducktv shows with a strong educational aspect. The episodes of this category teach first concepts, music and art, stimulate imagination and creativity, and develop cognitive skills.

programme.title: ducktv
programme.desc: In each season ducktv presents special seasonal episodes from diverse series. The shows of the seasons on ducktv section promote seasonal activities, reinforces the identification of seasonal characteristics and teach about the cycles of nature.

programme.title: Let's Move!
programme.desc: ducktv's let's move! episodes are all about sports, physical exercises and outdoor adventures. This section promotes movement and motor skills, develops basic coordination and a sense of rhythm through exercising.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers
programme.desc: Rainbow Rangers - Green is the New Black: Preston's fashion line releases microfibers into the ocean, causing environmental problems. / The Rangers go to try to help a bottle-nosed dolphin when it gets a plastic six-pack ring stuck on its nose and mouth.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers
programme.desc: Rainbow Rangers - Calling Fowl / Treehouse Trouble: The Rangers discover Preston Praxton is feeding ducks to keep them off his golf course and it's making them sick. / Preston is harvesting trees so Patty can build her massive dream treehouse, and is in turn destroying the forest.

programme.title: Angry Birds

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends
programme.desc: Talking Tom struggles with an app update while Talking Ben's relationship soars to new heights.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends
programme.desc: Trick-or-treat obsessed Talking Ginger scares up a memorable haunted Halloween.

programme.title: Shaq's Garage
programme.desc: Shaq's Garage - Runaway Train / New Friends: While Dr. Grease is inspecting an old steam locomotive, it takes off by itself down the track. Biggie D, Boone, Fleming, and Himari have to band together in order to overcome obstacles to get ahead of the runaway train and bring it to a stop. / New members Curl, Gonzales, and Layla get introduced and the Paq befriend them. While Bates, Himari, and Klaus are spending time with the new members, they find it difficult to relate to the new cars. The Paq must put aside their differences and work together in order to save Shaq from danger.

programme.title: Shaq's Garage
programme.desc: Shaq's Garage - Pilot / The Contest: The Shaq Paq is a group of sentient cars, led by Shaquille O'Neal, that helps out around the city of Orlanta. When a mother loses control of her baby stroller the Paq must band together to keep the baby from harm and return them to their mother. / Shaq enters Biggie D into a truck pull contest. The rest of the Shaq Paq helps him train but shockingly, Biggie D is defeated by another truck! That's when Dawkins realizes something doesn't quite add up. Shaq and the Paq band together to set things straight and learn an important lesson about fair play..

programme.title: Super Mario Bros 3
programme.desc: Super Mario Bros 3 - True Colors / Recycled Koopa: Kooky and Cheatsy use a special paint to turn all the Mushroom People either red or blue and trick the two colors into hating each other. / When the Koopalings can't get away with dumping their trash in the Mushroom Kingdom, they warp it all to Brooklyn.

programme.title: Super Mario Bros 3
programme.desc: Super Mario Bros 3 - The Venice Menace / Super Koopa: When an Italian Pizzaman mysteriously arrives in Desert Land and reports "a sea monster", Mario and friends go to Venice, Italy to investigate who is ruining Venice. / Kooky makes King Koopa a super power pendant which only works in the real world so he goes to Paris, France to rule which Mario and Luigi must stop a super powered King Koopa.

programme.desc: The mystery bounty hunter tracks Ras and Arin to the World Forest, while the Ninja search for the last Prismatic Blade.

programme.title: Crashing Together
programme.desc: Arin must choose between Ras and the Ninja as the battle for the Prismatic Blades rages across the World Forest.

programme.title: Beasts And Dragons, Rise Of Garmadon
programme.desc: Zane, Jay, and Kai remember some of Ninjago's fearsome creatures so that Cole defend the cave from an unidentified monster. But Ninja confront memories of their greatest villain and ally, Garmadon, before the threat to Zane controls him completely.

programme.title: Pteranodon't!
programme.desc: A young park guest accidentally strands himself in the Pteranodon aviary, requiring Owen and a testy Stygimoloch to stage a daring rescue.

programme.title: Boxed in!
programme.desc: Z-Blob returns in a daring rescue to break Mateo out of Dreamsmasher's box and helps him find Lunia's hourglass!

programme.title: The Happy App Trap
programme.desc: The Berlin Bright Bureau receives a mysterious package with new goggles to help them become more efficient dream chasers, but at what cost?

programme.title: Mission: Ungoggle-able
programme.desc: Mateo, Izzie, Zoey, and Cooper are unwilling participants in a sleep study at Happy App Headquarters, and it's up to the others to break them out!

programme.title: Secret Crush
programme.desc: Aliya and Liann take matters into their own hands as they go undercover to solve the mystery of Ley-La, the secretive and enigmatic figure who's been lurking around the periphery of their lives. Posing as reporters, they dig deep and discover a key clue.

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: Marvel Black Panther Trouble in Wakanda
programme.desc: Being the King of Wakanda is tough -- especially when you're also the Black Panther! When Thanos arrives from outer space and threatens to destroy Earth, the Black Panther leaps into action and defeats him with the help of Earth's Mightiest Heroes. But the situation only gets worse when rogue villains Killmonger and Klaue team up with the Mad Titan to take the fight to Black Panther's homeland! Can the Panther pounce on their perilous plan before Wakanda is pulverized?

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects somethingone of the Magic Books! It's The Book of Deception. They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: The Hundred Year Moon
programme.desc: At the night of the Hundred Year Moon, the Wolves are running wild and causing havoc. Crooler kidnaps a young gorilla girl to lure Laval, Eris and Gorzan the Gorilla out to rescue her. It is a very dangerous night, but finally Skinnet the Skunk's foul odor may prove useful.

programme.title: Fish Story!
programme.desc: Vic and Owen find themselves, along with Sinjin, in the middle of a massive dino-fight in the old Jurassic Park Visitor Center.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: aespa Music Video Compilation
programme.desc: Track List: Black Mamba, Forever (), Next Level, Savage, Life's Too Short, Girls, Welcome To MY World, I'm Unhappy, Salty & Sweet, Thirsty, Spicy, Til We Meet Again, Better Things, Drama, Supernova, Long Chat (#), Licorice, Live My Life, Armageddon, Whiplash, Dirty Work, Rich Man

programme.title: JUNGWOO 'SUGAR' MV
programme.desc: NCT JUNGWOO's first solo single SUGAR is a groovy pop song with swinginfused drums, a witty bassline, and a smooth, catchy melody. The lyrics send a warm message of gratitude to fans, wishing that past memories and future moments are all sweet. The music video brings this sweetness to life with colorful, sugar-inspired visuals, while the performance highlights JUNGWOO's stylish movements and precise choreography, showcasing his unique stage presence.

programme.title: TAEYEON 'Panorama' MV
programme.desc: TAEYEON celebrates the 10th anniversary of her solo debut with the compilation album Panorama, featuring the Pop Rock title track (Panorama). The song pairs vibrant piano, synths, and a strong drum line with soaring guitar riffs and TAEYEON's delicate yet powerful vocals. The music video presents a cinematic story of TAEYEON, who has lost her memory, and a girl who helps restore it a metaphor for the bond between the artist and her fans, SONEs. Its emotional, road-movie-style visuals reveal SONEs as the hidden protagonist. The 24-track album offers a retrospective of her past decade, unfolding like a panorama of her solo journey.

programme.title: WayV ' (Eternal White)' MV
programme.desc: The title track (Eternal White) is a dance-pop song that blends a rhythmic saxophone riff with energetic drum beats, creating a warm atmosphere through the harmony of powerful rap and sweet vocals. The lyrics express a strong determination to break free from time frozen like a white winter and to keep moving forward, capturing the hearts of listeners..

programme.title: DOYOUNG 'Promise' MV
programme.desc: The lyrics, written by DOYOUNG, capture the feelings he couldn't easily express as his love grew deeper. Even if the confession comes late, it delivers a sincerity and emotional resonance stronger than any other words.The title track Promise is an impressive ballad that begins with a minimal piano melody and gradually builds emotional depth as strings are added in the latter half.

programme.title: Robert Glasper & Jason Moran
programme.sub-title: La Gait Lyrique: Robert Glasper & Jason Moran
programme.desc: As part of the Blue Note Jazz Festival and Blue Note Records' 75th anniversary, pianists Robert Glasper and Jason Moran delivered a stunning jazz piano duet, resulting in an exciting exploration of the great history of jazz. An intricate knowledge of African-American music is infused with modern energy. The two musicians reinterpret the stride piano tradition through captivating original songs and personal interpretations of the music of Albert Ammons, Andrew Hill, Thelonious Monk, Ornette Coleman and Herbie Hancock.

programme.title: Christian Scott
programme.desc: In 2019, the vibrant city of Sofia, Bulgaria, hosted the International A to JazZ Festival. Among the featured acts was the trailblazing jazz trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah. This genre-defying artist captivated the audience with his eclectic stretch music an approach that incorporates hip-hop and reaches back through the American canon into African percussion and its rich melodic content. Trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah's quintet, which includes drummer Corey Fonville, percussionist Weedie Braimah, pianist Lawrence Fields, and bass guitarist Max Mucha, delivered a performance that defied boundaries and expectations.

programme.title: Jazzmeia Horn
programme.desc: Vocalist Jazzmeia Horn's 2019 Malta Jazz Festival appearance was a celebration of jazz's future, infused with the soul of its past. Featuring Keith Brown (piano), Rashaan Carter (bass), Irwin Hall (flute and saxophone), and Anwar Marshall (drums), the young singer's performance was a reminder of jazz's enduring power to speak to the heart. Situated at the Valletta waterfront outside Our Lady of Liesse Church, Horn's concert was a truly spellbinding experience.

programme.title: Dave Brubeck Trio, Cannonball Adderley Quintet, Charles Mingus Sextet & Jimmy Smith
programme.sub-title: Smith, Adderley, Brubeck, Mingus - Newport Jazz F.
programme.desc: The Newport Jazz Festival, first established in the North-American town of Newport, Rhode Island in the summer of 1954, has now grown to become one of the largest multi-day celebrations of jazz worldwide. It has resulted in numerous famous live albums from top-rate jazz stars, and has spawned several worldwide tours, including editions of the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. In October 1972, an outstanding lineup played shoulder-to-shoulder at the 7th Newport Jazz Festival held in Rotterdam's then-recently built concert venue De Doelen. These four masterful groups consisted of alto saxophonist "Cannonball" Adderley and his quintet (Nat Adderley on cornet, George Duke on keyboards, Walter Booker on bass, and Roy McCurdy on drums), Hammond organist Jimmy Smith and his band (Art Farmer on flugelhorn, Illinois Jacquet on tenor saxophone, Kenny Burrell on guitar, Clark Terry on trumpet, and Roy Haynes on drums), pianist Dave Brubeck and his trio (Jack Six on bass, Alan Dawson on drums) with accompaniment from Paul Desmond on alto saxophone and Gerry Mulligan on baritone saxophone, and bassist Charles Mingus and his group (Joe Gardner on trumpet, Hamiet Bluiett on baritone saxophone, John Foster on piano, Roy Brooks on drums) with the great high-note trumpeter Cat Anderson as a guest.

programme.title: Milt Jackson
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Seasick Steve
programme.desc: Steven Gene Wold, commonly known as Seasick Steve, (born circa 1941) is an American bluesman, although he prefers to be called "a song and dance man". He plays guitars (mostly personalized), and sings, usually about his early life living rough and doing casual work.

programme.title: Charlie Galbraith
programme.desc: In 1963, the small Belgian town of Comblain-la-Tour hosted an exciting line-up of both new and older jazz groups. Opening things up is the British trombonist Charlie Galbraith's All Star Jazz Band, performing classic Dixieland jazz. Next up is German singer Knut Kiesewetter, who, with backing from the Prague Dixieland Band, sings the blues. Perhaps the highlight of this event is the coupling of American alto saxophonist Bud Shank with Dutch pianist Pim Jacobs' trio, who play standards and bossa nova. Bringing things to a close are French clarinetist Marc Laferrire and his New Orleans Stompers with more classic Dixieland.

programme.title: Tim Weiss, Arctic Philharmonic, Berit Norbakken Solset & ystein Moen
programme.sub-title: Glass - A Descent into the Maelstrm
programme.desc: A Descent into the Maelstrm' (1841) is American writer Edgar Allan Poe's short story of two fishermen caught in torrents raging between the mountainous islands of Lofoten, inside the Arctic Circle of northern Norway. After a treacherous whirlpool drags their boat down, only one of them survives. American composer Philipp Glass based his choral work for the Australian Dance Theatre on this story. The piece was performed at the Adelaide Festival of Arts in 1986. Beacon Isle Films recorded an arrangement of Glass's work for symphony orchestra, performed by the Arctic Philharmonic Orchestra and Choir conducted by Tim Weiss. Soprano Berit Norbakken Solset is the soloist. The Artic Philharmonic Orchestra is the world's youngest and northernmost professional orchestral institution, presenting circa 150 performances and concerts each year. This 2019 recording was made against the backdrop of Lofoten's spectacular landscape: the very surroundings that inspired Poe's story.

programme.title: Martha Argerich
programme.desc: Cinematic classical clips and energizing concert pieces featuring up-and-coming artists.

programme.title: Carlos Miguel Prieto & Orquesta Sinfnica de Minera
programme.desc: Mahler's "Resurrection" Symphony, written between 1888 and 1894, is a colossal five-movement work exploring themes of death and resurrection. It was one of Mahler's most popular and acclaimed works during his lifetime, famously culminating in a powerful choral finale. The symphony features immense orchestral forces, including offstage brass and a large choir, which combine to create overwhelming sonic experiences that depict profound spiritual and emotional narratives. The grand scale and dramatic structure represent the triumph of life over death.

programme.title: Martha Argerich, Lily Maisky, Iddo Bar-Shai & Tedi Papavrami
programme.sub-title: Martha Argerich A Birthday Celebration III
programme.desc: On the occasion of her 80th birthday, Argentinian pianist Martha Argerich explored chamber music repertoire in this wonderful concert, recorded at Chteau de Chantilly, France. The Grande Dame' of the piano is joined by various renowned artists, including pianists Lily Maisky and Iddo Bar-Sha, violinists Tedi Papavrami and Akiko Suwanai, her daughter Lyda Chen-Argerich on viola, and cellist Mischa Maisky. On the program are Felix Mendelssohn's Piano Trio No. 1 in D minor, Op. 49 Leo Janek's Violin Sonata Franz Schubert's Rondo in A major, D. 951 and Johannes Brahms's Piano Quartet No. 3 in C minor, Op. 60. These performances were recorded on May 4 and June 13, 2021.

programme.title: Ivn Fischer & Orchestra del Maggio Musicale Fiorentino
programme.sub-title: Mozart Symphony No. 34 & Dvok Symphony No. 7
programme.desc: Maestro Ivn Fischer leads the Orchestra del Maggio Musicale Fiorentino in a remarkable concert program of works by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart and Antonn Dvok. Mozart's Symphony No. 34 in C major, K. 338 opens the program. Completed in the summer of 1780, this was the last symphony Mozart wrote in Salzburg, where he worked as a court musician. The three-movement symphony features two vibrant outer movements with fanfares and rousing themes, while the quieter second movement is scored for strings alone, deviating from the typical four-movement structure of the time. Next on the program is Dvok's Symphony No. 7 in D minor, Op. 70, completed in March 1885 and premiered one month later in London conducted by the composer himself. With its dramatic and dark style, this symphony stands in stark contrast to the predominantly optimistic tone of Dvok's broader oeuvre. This performance was recorded at Teatro del Maggio Musicale Fiorentino in Florence, Italy, on January 29, 2021.

programme.title: Alice In Chains
programme.desc: In their first live concert in over 2 years (and possibly their last concert ever), Alternative/metal group Alice in Chains performs acoustically at MTV Unplugged. Includes acoustic versions of the hit songs "Got Me Wrong," "Rooster," "Would?," and "Down in a Hole."

programme.title: Korn
programme.desc: Korn is an American nu metal band from Bakersfield, California, formed in 1993. The band's current lineup includes founding members Jonathan Davis (vocals, bagpipes), James "Munky" Shaffer (guitar), Brian "Head" Welch (guitar, backing vocals), and Reginald "Fieldy" Arvizu (bass), with the addition of Ray Luzier who replaced the band's original drummer, David Silveria. This Korn performance was filmed live at Brixton Academy in London, GB, on May 2, 2014.

programme.title: Snow Patrol
programme.desc: With their third album, 'Final Straw', selling a cool 1.5 million in the UK in its year of release, Snow Patrol's reputation as a remarkable band remains intact. 'Live At Somerset House' reveals why the band is praised for delivering fantastic live performances. It also places them at one of London's most gorgeous settings which complements the band's distinctive and provocative sound perfectly. Performing live for the first time with a string section, this amazing Snow Patrol concert, features all the key hits including 'Run', 'Spitting Games', 'Chocolate' and a blistering version of 'Tiny Little Fractures'.

programme.title: James Morrison
programme.desc: T in the Park festival is a major Scottish music festival that has been held almost annually since 1994 (the event did not take place in 2017). It is named after its main sponsor, the brewing company Tennents.

programme.title: Tom Odell
programme.desc: Having already conquered the UK with his chart-topping debut album Long Way Down', don't miss Tom Odell's dazzling live show filmed at Irving Plaza, New York City. Watch the 22-year-old English wunderkind deliver stirring hits like Another Love', as he brings his heart-wrenching album to life in gorgeous fashion.

programme.title: Hawaii Sunrise Waves

programme.title: Islands of Paradise w Music
programme.desc: Transform any TV or digital screen into a window to the beautiful Yasawa islands of Fiji, with this one hour-long, soothing visual journey. Palm trees, tropical lagoons, birds chirping, waves lapping, golden sunsets and fiery sunrises are just a few of the scenes in store for the viewer. Enjoy nearly all the benefits of a relaxing tropical vacation from the comfort of your home!

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland II
programme.desc: Experience the wonders of summertime in Iceland from an elevated perspective with "Flying Over Iceland II: Summer in the Golden Circle". Filmed during quarantine in September of 2020, ambient film features an immersive slow-moving aerial perspective of some of Islandia's most iconic and famous south coast loop locations - all in glorious sunlight. Beginning at the stunning 200 foot high Skogafoss waterfall, viewers next are gently flown to the charming coastal city of Vik, which overlooks the famous Vikurfjara Black Sand Beach. Here ancient lava flows have sculpted some impressive coastal outcroppings which viewers will witness from a bird's eye view, before soaring to great heights in order to witness the distant glaciers and unique geography of South Iceland as never seen before. From the black sand beach we then soar west to the charming Dyrholaey Lighthouse, which also sits atop some absolutely stunning coastal rock formations including a giant arch at sea level. After returning to Vik the film next progresses to the glacier Vatnajkull, offering majestic views of Iceland's largest glacier. From soaring above the misty clouds to dipping down into the ice formations, the film ends with multiple unique perspectives of the glacial area including young pine forests, a visit from some local sheep, and a journey above and below the clouds for one final refreshing cap to the 1 hour film.
